title: Mathematics Practical Skills Enhancement Course for Supporting Online Programs

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational mathematics knowledge (algebra, statistics) and experience using online learning systems
context.additional_context: Customized mathematics education support for current practitioners, combining online interaction and offline hands-on practice

learning_goals: Learners can design real-world-based mathematical problem-solving processes using online collaboration tools.
Learners can perform peer assessments through asynchronous discussion boards and establish a feedback system.
Learners can analyze real workplace cases using mathematical modeling tools and make data-driven decisions.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
